sessions.title: Through the Gates of Vallaki
highlights: We arrive at the Blue Water Inn to stay the night.

sessions.title: Viva La RÃ©sistance
highlights: Ernst helps us escape Izek and his guards.
Gaetano posses as a bum to throw off guards.
We are brought to Lady Watcher and are introduced to the resistance.
Lady watcher commissions us to capture the Burgomaster, Baron Vargas Vallakovich, and kill Izek for the murder of her husband.

sessions.title: The Burgermeister's Abode
highlights: Megren is the first to enter the burgermeister's house.
Zilla enters a diningroom after barely evading a guard.
Gaetano enters a second story bedroom window and finds a short sword.
Kenrue enters the backroom with Megren
Megren and Sarah check the first floor hallway and notice there are bundles of sticks all over the place.
Kenrue sneaks up stairs, snufs out a flame so he is hidden, and notices a guard at the other end of the hallway.
Megren casts infestation, which makes the guard think he is covered in fleas.
Gaetano enters the hallway and decides to pick open a locked door. Behind the door is a cell that holds all of our things!
Emerging from the bathroom, the guard catches Zilla, Megren, and Kenrue in the hallway.
Zilla puts the guard to sleep and then is immediately granted the power of teleportation.
She teleports into the locked room that she is standing next to, which turns out to be a study.
Zilla grabs a book 'Poetry Anthology', unlocks the door, and exits into the hallway.
Gaetano notices a guard is coming up the main stairway in the front.
Zilla teleports into another room with a wedding dress. She hears snoring coming from the behind a door.
Gaetano dresses in the sleeping guard's outfit and posses as him in the darkness to fool the other guard.
Zilla sneaks into the room where she heard snoring and finds the burgermeister and his wife asleep in their bed. She also notices a door in the ceiling.
Zilla climbs through the door into a small room in the attic. She opens a door to reveal the room that Gaetano, Megren, and Kenrue were imprisoned in 2 sessions ago.
The guard becomes suspicious of Gaetano's disguise, so Kenrue steps out right in the face of the guard, and commands him to lock himself in the cell at the end of the hall.

sessions.title: How Not to Free a Town
highlights: The gang attempts to team up with children to rid the town of fire nation control
Things do not go as planned

sessions.title: The Great Escape
highlights: After facing certain death the gang fatefully escapes the Fire Nation
